alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 1:41PM CST until December 15 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow, heavy at times. Some mix with sleet will be possible early on. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusts of 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Marquette, Green Lake, Fond du Lac and Sheboygan Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 7 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the early morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The precipitation will transition from rain to snow quickly late this evening, with heavy snow possible at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette; Sheboygan
